screenshots.caption: A vision of how the holo projector should look

name: Holo Projector Simulation GUI Library
short_description: HoloMenu is a C library for creating GUIs with holographic simulator view. It helps creating buttons, text boxes and other components with effects similar to Syndicate Wars. It is designed to use as menu in games, but may be used for other projects.
